sourcesContent: import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Card, CardBody, CardHeader, Col, FormGroup, Input, Label, Row, Button } from "reactstrap"; import firebase from "./../../config"; const Profile = () => { const [account, setAccount] = useState( JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("account") || "{}") ); useEffect(() => { const ref = firebase.database(); ref .ref("users") .orderByChild("username") .equalTo(account.username) .on("value", snapshot => { if (snapshot.val() !== null) { const [acc] = Object.values(snapshot.val()); setAccount(acc); } }); }, []); return ( Profile Form prev => ({ ...prev, ingame: value })} /> (Url) prev => ({ ...prev, avatar: value })} /> ); }; export default Profile;
